title: Morphed tweet now says Amit Shah referred to Sushant Singh Rajput as a Cricketer
subtitle: Amit Shah in reaction to the untimely death of Bollywood actor Sushant Singh Rajput, referred him as a young and very talented actor, not as a cricketer.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A screenshot of the tweet posted by Amit shah is being shared on social media claiming that Amit Shah referred to Sushant Singh Rajput as a talented cricketer. Factly has found out that the tweet shared in the post is an edited using the tweet by Rahul Gandhi in his official Twitter account. In reaction to the sudden demise of the Bollywood actor Sushant Singh Rajput, Amit shah expressed his grief by tweeting from his official Twitter account. In his tweet, Amit shah referred to Sushant as a talented actor and said he will be remembered for his contribution to Indian cinema. Amit Shah has not referred to Sushant as a cricketer. The tweet shown in the post is an edited version of the Rahul Gandhi’s tweet related to Sushant’s death. The same false tweet was earlier shared as the one tweeted by Rahul Gandhi, which was debunked by Factly.
